Upgrade Fedora from 21 - 23

  1. yum is being replaced by dnf. I think Fedora 21 has dnf, we just need to configure it.
    sudo vi /etc/dnf/dnf.conf

    Add the proxy information to it in the main section 

    proxy=http://170.64.0.72:8080
proxy_username=x1kxk630
proxy_password=<password>
  2. First of all, upgrade to the latest version of the current level
    sudo dnf upgrade
  3. Install the DNF upgrade plugins
    sudo dnf install dnf-plugin-system-upgrade
  4. Download the files for the upgrade
    sudo dnf system-upgrade download --releasever=23 --best
  5. Reboot and upgrade
    sudo dnf system-upgrade reboot
  6. Cleanup after the upgrade
    1. Remove unused packages
      sudo rpm --rebuilddb
sudo dnf distro-sync --setopt=deltarpm=0

sudo dnf install rpmconf
sudo rpmconf -a
  7. If you have chrome
    sudo dnf remove google-chrome-\* && sudo dnf install google-chrome-[beta,stable,unstable]
